name: Bullet Mayhem
description:
Use WASD for your characters movement.
Use Left CTRL or Space to slow down time and activate your dash ability.

Tips:

While falling you have no way of controlling other than dashing.
Your dashes recharge upon landing on the ground.
Don't touch the red bullets or the red floor.
If you end your movement with 0 dashes over a red death-pit, its game over as you will surely fall into it.

Music :

Club Seamus Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
